test_desc: Ensure only trusted users are allowed to control Docker daemon
test_rationale: You should remove any untrusted users from the docker group using command sudo gpasswd -d <your-user> docker or add trusted users to the docker group using command sudo usermod -aG docker <your-user>. You should not create a mapping of sensitive directories from the host to container volumes.
